mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM student_unit WHERE type = 1 and student_id = #{stuId} AND ( word_status = 1 OR sentence_status = 1 )

select
from student_unit where student_id = #{student.id} and type = 1 and course_id > #{courseId} group by course_id order by course_id asc

and su.course_id = c.id and c.study_paragraph = #{grade}

SELECT a.student_id, a.head_url AS headUrl, SUM(a.sumUnit) AS countUnit, a.student_name, a.squad, a.school_name FROM ( SELECT u.student_id, u.course_id, SUM(u.word_status) AS sumUnit, s.student_name, s.head_url, s.squad, s.school_name FROM student_unit u, student s WHERE u.student_id = s.id GROUP BY u.course_id, u.student_id ) a JOIN student b ON a.student_id = b.id JOIN course_new c ON a.course_id = c.id AND c.study_paragraph = #{study_paragraph} AND c.version = #{version} AND b.grade = #{grade} AND b.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY a.student_id ORDER BY countUnit DESC

SELECT a.student_id, SUM(a.sumUnit) AS countUnit, a.student_name, a.squad, a.school_name FROM ( SELECT u.student_id, u.course_id, SUM(u.word_status) AS sumUnit, s.student_name, s.squad, s.school_name FROM student_unit u, student s WHERE u.student_id = s.id GROUP BY u.course_id, u.student_id ) a JOIN student b ON a.student_id = b.id JOIN course_new c ON a.course_id = c.id AND c.study_paragraph = #{study_paragraph} AND c.version = #{version} AND b.teacher_id = #{teacherId} GROUP BY a.student_id ORDER BY countUnit DESC LIMIT 50;
